Replace.Text: [COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_GAMEMODE_BARBARIAN_CLANS_DESCRIPTION]This game mode replaces standard Barbarian Tribes with a diverse set of Clans, each with its own terrain and combat preferences. Additionally, the mode introduces new player actions for peaceful interactions with Barbarians that provide increased strategic options.

[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_TRAIT_CIVILIZATION_FIRST_CIVILIZATION_CLANS_MODE_DESCRIPTION]When you disperse a Barbarian Outpost, receive a Tribal Village reward in addition to the usual Experience Points. Pay half the usual cost to levy city-state units.
